channel.title: Need help with editing my server
channel.description: does anyone know the cde for getting that welcome window for when you log onto a server? cuz i would like one :D and if there is a variety of them could you please tell me all of them? thanks :D

item.title: Need help with editing my server
item.dc:creator: @Olbrantz Olbrantz
item.description:
@Olbrantz wrote:

pizza pie:

no it doesnt, cuz its not a method, declare it as a void and then ull need a closing bracket

Voids are methods. The behavior of a method is called a void, buddy.

Santy:

k but where do i put it?

I shouldn’t have to tell you that. Look for any other method -“void” in your case, and add it under.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with editing my server
item.dc:creator: @Olbrantz Olbrantz
item.description:
@Olbrantz wrote:

Yes, sorry, should look like this.

[code]public void WhatYouWant()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@Theiving", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Theiving help guide", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Silver stall@dbl@", 8147);
                sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Requirents: 85 theiving@dbl@", 8148);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Located at: 2658,3312@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@-------------@dbl@", 8150);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Tea Stall@dbl@", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Requirements: None@dbl@", 8152);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Located at: 3269,3412@dbl@", 8153);
					sendQuest("@dbl@-------------@dbl@", 8154);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Secret crate@dbl@", 8155);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Requirements: 99 theiving@dbl@", 8156);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Located at: 2954,3303 @dbl@", 8157);
					sendQuest("@dbl@-------------", 8160); 
							
                               	sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Type ::castlewars for info on theiving stalls there@dbl@", 8161);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@-------------@dbl@", 8162);
				 sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@-------------@dbl@", 8163);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(####);
				flushOutStream();
	
			}[/code] But obviously you can change the text and interface ID. Just add it like all your methods.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with editing my server
item.dc:creator: @Olbrantz Olbrantz
item.description:
@Olbrantz wrote:

Fine. I will give you this simple code. It’s obviously a menu, but where it says showInterface(####); is where you change the interface number.

sendQuest("@whi@Rules.", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@gre@1.@whi@Dont auto.", 8145); sendQuest("@gre@2.@whi@Respect all admins and mods.", 8147); sendQuest("@gre@3.@whi@Dont team at 1on1 spot.", 8148); sendQuest("@gre@4.@whi@Dont Farcast at 1on1 spot.", 8149); sendQuest("@gre@5.@whi@Dont PJ somebody after a fight at 1on1 spot.", 8150); sendQuest("@gre@6.@whi@Dont disrespect anyone at all.", 8151); sendQuest("@gre@7.@whi@No drop partys.", 8152); sendQuest("@gre@8.@whi@You MUST ask for the fight at pkspot.", 8153); sendQuest("@gre@9.@whi@Do not trade untradable items.", 8154); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream();

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with editing my server
